anime: in anime style, sharp lines, cel shading, vivid colors, expressive eyes, clean background, highly stylized
ghibli: studio ghibli style, soft colors, whimsical atmosphere, painterly textures, dreamlike, magical realism, gentle lighting
noir: noir style, black and white, high contrast, moody lighting, film grain, 1940s aesthetic, cinematic shadows
gogh: in the style of Vincent van Gogh, swirling brushstrokes, thick oil paint texture, post-impressionism, vivid colors
